ValidationRule.description: Online Status "Offline-Auto" is not able to be selected manually. Is selected in auto process only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Bypass_VR__c ), ISCHANGED(online_status__c ) , ISPICKVAL( online_status__c , "Offline - Auto") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Offline - Auto" is not available to you - please try again
